revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=E4200 |revision=v1 |upc=745883590438 |asin=B004K1EZDS |serialnum_prefix=01C10C |est_release_date=01/19/2011 |fcc_date=10/20/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-E4200 |ic_id=3839A-E4200 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4718A1 |cpu1_cspeed=480 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128BVFG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6JB-3 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4718A1 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53115 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2528L;SiGe, 2528L, 108EC;2; ,,, 2.4/5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SE2594L;SiGe, SE2594L, 109HD;3; |flags= |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,Tomato (Shibby),Tomato RAF (Victek) |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=CiscoXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Cisco[A-Z0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=58:6D:8F, C0:C1:C0 |oui_eth=58:6D:8F, C0:C1:C0 }} {{TagLine|Maximum Performance Dual-Band N Router}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=E4200}}
"3763-40700105R" and the '''Cisco''' logo is silkscreened on the board. :This router uses [http://www.galtronics.com Galtronics] antennas. :<small>Note: Three antennas are used by the 2.4 GHz radio, but it's still a 2T2R radio..</small>
The default SSID pattern for this device is '''CiscoXXXXXX''' on both bands, :where '''XXXXX''' is the last 5 characters of the serial number.
{{WiFiCert|WFA9933|10/18/2010}}
==Additional external links== ===Wikis=== *{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_E4200_v1}} *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_E4200 On the '''DD-WRT''' wiki] ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31399-cisco-linksys-e4200-maximum-performance-wireless-n-router-reviewed ''Review'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://tomatousb.org/forum/t-303285/ On the '''TomatoUSB''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=148893 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] :The v1 serial numbers appear to start with '''01C10C'''..
===Firmware projects=== This device is supported by... *''Victek'''s [http://tomatoraf.com '''Tomato RAF''' builds] *''Shibby'''s [http://tomato.groov.pl/?page_id=69 '''Tomato''' builds] (K26 and K26RT-N) *''Toastman'''s [http://www.4shared.com/dir/v1BuINP3/Toastman_Builds.html#dir=v1BuINP3 '''Tomato''' builds]
